item.title: CVE-2024-31921|2024-04-15T09:27:06.612Z -- Etoile Web Design -- Ultimate Product Catalogue
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Etoile Web Design Ultimate Product Catalogue.This issue affects Ultimate Product Catalogue: from n/a through 5.2.15.
